title: SPAC Week: Whoever Wins California Wins Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: It's SPAC week and why not start with Subversive Capital and the biggest cannabis SPAC ever, launching this week: The Parent Company. Subversive Founder and Chairman Michael Auerbach joins Rena Sherbill to discuss California as the tip of the spear and why it was always the focus. Creating a generational company and real change. Shared social equity vision with Jay-Z. Consolidating and dominating despite a saturated SPAC market. Being included in the chart topping ETF MSOS and why it's the best investment in cannabis right now. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
